item.title: Lyle Menendez set for parole board hearing day after brother was denied
item.description: A panel denied Erik Menendez, Lyle's brother, parole after a 10-hour hearing on Thursday.

item.title: 1 person dead in shooting at shipyard that builds Navy vessels, officials say
item.description: Ingalls Shipbuilding is the largest supplier of U.S. Navy surface combatants, and the largest manufacturing employer in Mississippi.

item.title: Hurricane Erin brings dangerous surf and flooding to East Coast
item.description: From the Outer Banks to Jones Beach, Hurricane Erin is fueling waves up to 20 feet, flooding coastal towns and leaving millions under flood alerts. CB...

item.title: Cracker Barrel loses almost $100 million in value after new logo release
